<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Quick Recognition](/Feats.aspx?ID=5197) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 260 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), Master in [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10), Master in [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11), or Master in [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13); [Recognize Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=5205)

</column>

---

You Recognize Spells swiftly. Once per round, you can Recognize a Spell using a skill in which you’re a master as a free action.

<title level="2">Quick Recognition leads to...</title>
[Clever Counterspell](/Feats.aspx?ID=5041), [Mythic Counterspell](/Feats.aspx?ID=7287)
